lead_paragraph: Calling the shots is something Gary Kubiak has been doing superbly for over three decades, first as a quarterback for the Denver Broncos and then in various coaching positions for multiple teams.

headline.print_headline: Kubiak Calls the Shots, Through Unity and Inspiration
headline.main: Kubiak Calls the Shots, Through Unity and Inspiration
